## everyNeighboringCoordinate() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Determine if some predicate holds true for every coordinate surrounding a specified coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function everyNeighboringCoordinate(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate, predicate: StackFn): boolean;
```

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The coordinate whose neighbors will be tested.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

predicate


</td><td>

[StackFn](./hive-lib.stackfn.md)


</td><td>

A predicate to test.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if predicate evalutes to true for every neighbor, false otherwise.
